metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31612 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause an out-of-bounds read, which may lead to a system crash or a leak of internal kernel information.

notes.Note: sbeattie> Windows drivers only mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
